text: @_Freeman_Dube @ToddMaf @advocatemahere @nickmangwana @PoliceZimbabwe @edmnangagwa Bro its a futile exercise kusebenza isende. Chamisa went to SC and lost so can we blame oKhupe laboMwonzora for following the judgement. It’s foolish to keep going to courts and getting similar results especially when Chamisa didn’t follow constitution what did he expect??
